# Security Policy

## Supported Versions

| Version | Supported          |
|---------|--------------------|
| Latest  | :white_check_mark: |

## Reporting a Vulnerability

We take all security vulnerabilities seriously. If you discover an issue, please report it to us as soon as possible through the [GitHub Security Advisory](https://github.com/chirag127/InkWell-Note-Taking-Mobile-App/security/advisories/new) feature. We will acknowledge your report within **48 hours** and will make a best effort to address the vulnerability promptly. We will also send a personal thank you to the reporter.

**Please do not disclose the vulnerability publicly until it has been fixed.**

### Steps to Report:

1.  **Create a Security Advisory:** Navigate to the Security tab of this repository and click "New draft security advisory".
2.  **Provide Details:** Clearly describe the vulnerability, including:
    *   Affected version(s).
    *   Steps to reproduce the vulnerability.
    *   Potential impact.
    *   Any relevant logs or screenshots.
3.  **Submit:** Submit the advisory privately. Our security team will review and respond.

---

**Thank you for helping keep the InkWell-Note-Taking-Mobile-App secure!**
